text: adhkr -ayha alrswl- yawm albaeth mbshrana wmkhwfana, hin yadeu allah eaza wajala kl jamaeat min alnaas mae 'imamhm aladhi kanuu yqtdwn bih fi aldnya, faman kan minhum salhana, w'uety kitab 'aemalah bymynh, fhwla' yqrwwn kitab hsnathm farihin mstbshryn, wala yunqaswn min thawab 'aemalahum alsalht shyyana, wa'iin kan mqdar alkhayt aldhy yakun fi shaqq alnwat
